DOC.brief_summary: Determine validity compare visualization arterial segment obtain 3 dos iopamidol determine dose investigation future trial .
DOC.criteria: Provide inform consent At least 30 year age Weight less 250 lb Known suspect coronary artery disease suspect significant coronary artery stenosis Undergo MDCTA scan Undergo coronary angiography within 2 week MDCTA scan Hx hypersensitivity iodinate contrast agent Known suspected hyperthyroidism pheochromocytoma Renal impairment History coronary artery stent placement bypass graft Unstable Pregnant lactating
